text: aur hamane tumhaare paas arabee quraan yoon bheja taaki tum makka vaalon ko aur jo log isake ird gird rahate hain unako darao aur (unako) qayaamat ke din se bhee darao jis (ke aane) mein kuchh bhee shaq nahin (us din) ek phareeq (maanane vaala) jannat mein hoga aur phareeq (saanee) dozakh mein
